contact.name: Contact Form
contact.title: Contact Form
contact.caption:
**WIN an all-expenses paid trip to a 2021 HSBC World Rugby Sevens Series tournament of your choice, courtesy of HSBC.**

**Prize includes:**
Two VIP tickets to any tournament of your choice
Two return flights to the tournament
Accommodation and more!

To be entered for a chance to win, please provide your details to HSBC by filling out the below form.
